original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yānagatassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū yānagatassa dhammaṃ desenti pe

original: “Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: na yāna gatassa a gilānassa dhammam desessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: vayhaṁ ratho sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
analyzed: vayham ratho sakaṭam sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī
na yāna gatassa a gilānassa dhammaḥ desetabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca yāna gatassa a gilānassa dhammam deseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
